{{Wireless embedded system |brand=WRTnode |model=7 |revision=(MT7697) |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=06/12/2017 |manuf_country= |is_manuf=Yes |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=now |type=mini module, IoT board |fcc_id=2ALR4-WRTNODE7 |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=3.3 |pwr_amp=0.3 |pwr_conn=SD |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7697 |cpu1_cspeed=192 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=NOR |fla2=64 KiB |fla2_brand=MediaTek |fla2_model=MT7697 |ram1=256 KiB |ram1_brand=MediaTek |ram1_model=MT7697 |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, 2x UART,, |wi1_module=WRTnode 7 |wi1_module_if=SD (40-pin) |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7697 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=MHF4 |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_none=true |eth_cpu= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed= |lan_ports= |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags=Bluetooth 4.2 LE |stock_boot=U-Boot |stock_os=Linux;FreeRTOS; |tp_firmware=OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.8.1 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|WRTnode 7 IoT Board (MT7697)}} :[http://7.wrtnode.cc Product page] {{•}} [https://github.com/WRTnode WRTnode GitHub] :[http://wiki.wrtnode.com/index.php?title=Main_Page WRTnode 1 Wiki] {{•}} [http://wiki.wrtnode.cc/index.php?title=首页/en WRTnode 2 Wiki]
*FCC-ID: [https://fccid.io/2ALR4-WRTNODE7 2ALR4-WRTNODE7] (2017-06-12) :[https://fccid.io/2ALR4-WRTNODE7/User-Manual/User-Manual-3422462 Datasheet] • [https://www.seeedstudio.com/LinkIt-7697-p-2818.html ''SeeedStudio'' LinkIt 7697] {{see also|LinkIt 7697|LinkIt Smart 7688}}
====[[WRTnode 7]]==== *CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7697 @192MHz :(ARM Cortex-M4 w/ FPU) • [http://7.wrtnode.cc Spec.] *Flash: 32Mbite (NOR), RAM: 352KB (SRAM) *WLAN: 802.11bgn 2.4GHz (150Mbps) :Bluetooth 4.2 BLE (WiFi/BLE/MCU) *I/O: 2x UART, SPI (master/slave), 2x I2C, I2S, :4x ADC (12bit), 28x GPIO, 28x PWM (40-pin) *Power: 3.3V, Temp: -35~85℃, OS: FreeRTOS *Dimensions: 23 x 18 mm
===Reviews=== *[http://www.cnx-software.com/2015/08/17/wrtnode2p-wrtnode2r-and-wrtnodehi-openwrt-boards-to-feature-m-2-mini-pcie-edge-connectors-h-265-camera-support-and-more/ ''WRTnode Boards'' on '''CNX-Software''']
